translations: v．沉溺，纵容：允许自己或他人享受特殊的愉悦，尤指过分地满足自己的欲望或需求。
· He indulges in his favorite food on weekends.
他在周末沉溺于他最喜欢的食物。

sentences.sentence: He indulges his children too much.
It indulges in what we fear the most.
sentences.translation: 它所沉湎的，正是我们最惧怕的。

sentences.sentence: He indulges himself in bars every weekend or holiday. This is his special way of relaxing.
sentences.translation: 他一到周末或节假日就去泡吧，这是他特有的休息方式。
